if (event.getResult() == ReaderActions.UpdateResult.HAS_NEW
                && event.getAction() == UpdateAction.REQUEST_NEWER
                && getPostListType() == ReaderPostListType.TAG_FOLLOWED
                && !isPostAdapterEmpty()
                && !isFirstPostVisible())
mappings.right:

                && !isPostAdapterEmpty()
